item.title: Cloudflare 首席执行官力图避开马斯克在巴西与 X 的争执
item.description: 网络提供商 Cloudflare Inc 首席执行官周一表示，该公司既没有帮助埃隆-马斯克的 X 逃避巴西的禁令，也没有在巴西监管机构寻求恢复封锁时给予协助。【原文：Network provider Cloudflare Inc neither helped Elon Musk’s X evade a ban in Brazil nor assisted the country’s regulators as they sought to restore the block, its chief executive officer said Monday.】

item.title: 加密货币矿工停战为暴乱接管比特币矿场留下了可能性
item.description: 尽管比特币矿机制造商比特大陆有限公司（Bitfarms Ltd.）与Riot Platforms Inc.在长达数月的收购战中达成了停战协议，但该协议仍为收购留下了可能性。【原文：While Bitcoin miner Bitfarms Ltd. has brokered a truce with Riot Platforms Inc. over a months-long takeover fight, the agreement still leaves open the possibility for an acquisition.】

item.title: 应用营养公司寻求最快于 10 月在伦敦上市
item.description: 据一位熟知内情的人士透露，运动营养、健康和保健公司 Applied Nutrition Ltd. 正在寻求在英国秋季预算声明发布之前尽快在伦敦证券交易所上市。【原文：Applied Nutrition Ltd., a sports nutrition, health and wellness company, is seeking to list on the London Stock Exchange as soon as before the UK’s autumn budget statement, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 压力增大，Stellantis 开始寻找塔瓦雷斯的继任者
item.description: Stellantis NV 主席约翰-埃尔坎（John Elkann）已开始物色首席执行官卡洛斯-塔瓦雷斯（Carlos Tavares）的继任者。【原文：Stellantis NV Chairman John Elkann has started a search for a successor to Chief Executive Officer Carlos Tavares, whose contract runs out in early 2026.】

item.description: 沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基周一将在美国银行纽约总部会见大型能源公司的高管，讨论乌克兰在与俄罗斯的战争使其能源行业陷入危机后对电力的迫切需求。【原文：Volodymyr Zelenskiy will meet executives from major energy companies at Bank of America’s New York headquarters on Monday to discuss Ukraine’s urgent need for power after the war with Russia plunged its energy sector into crisis.】

item.title: 雅德尼称美联储减息提高了股市 "彻底崩盘 "的几率
item.description: 华尔街策略师埃德-亚德尼（Ed Yardeni）认为，美联储上周积极降息半个百分点可能会使美股飙升至新高，但如果央行官员不谨慎行事，也可能导致通胀重现。【原文：US stocks can soar to fresh highs thanks to the Federal Reserve’s aggressive half-point interest rate cut last week, but it also could cause inflation to resurface if central bankers don’t tread carefully, according to Wall Street strategist Ed Yardeni.】

item.title: 苹果公司晚间暴跌引发关于谁在抛售的猜测
item.description: 周五本应是苹果公司股价的好日子，这家 iPhone 制造商将成为主要股指季度调整的大赢家。整个交易时段的大部分时间都是如此，直到收盘前十分钟。【原文：Friday was supposed to be a good day for the shares of Apple Inc., with the iPhone maker set to be a big winner from the quarterly adjustment of major stock indexes. And for most of the session, that’s how it played out — until about 10 minutes before the closing bell.】

item.title: DHL 集团的新战略目标是到 2030 年收入增长 50
item.description: 德国邮政股份公司（DHL Group）宣布了一项新战略，旨在通过一系列增长措施，到 2030 年将收入提高 50%。【原文：Deutsche Post AG, which trades as DHL Group, announced a new strategy aimed at boosting revenue by 50% by 2030 through a raft of growth initiatives.】

item.title: 中国要求 WTO 专家小组调查美国降低通胀法案
item.description: 中国第二次尝试在世界贸易组织成立争端小组，审查《降低通货膨胀法》的补贴是否非法偏袒美国商品而非进口商品。【原文：China succeeded in its second attempt to establish a dispute panel at the World Trade Organization to review whether subsidies from the Inflation Reduction Act unlawfully favor US goods over imports.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行任命巴克莱银行的 Enrico Chiapparoli 为意大利区主管
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）已聘请巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）银行家恩里科-奇亚帕罗利（Enrico Chiapparoli）担任意大利国家主管，以应对欧元区第三大经济体领导层的转型。【原文：Societe Generale SA has hired Barclays Plc banker Enrico Chiapparoli as its Italy country head, navigating a leadership transition in the eurozone’s third-largest economy.】

item.title: 美联储降息后，美国公司准备借贷数十亿美元
item.description: 美联储上周决定开始下调基准利率，推动借贷成本下降，企业借款人周一纷纷涌入债市。【原文：Corporate borrowers are storming debt markets on Monday following the Federal Reserve’s decision last week to begin lowering its benchmark interest rate, pushing borrowing costs down.】

item.title: 铜在中国潜在刺激政策和需求推动下上涨
item.description: 由于投资者预期中国可能采取刺激措施，加上各国央行开始宽松周期的提振，铜价上涨。【原文：Copper rose as investors anticipate a potential stimulus from China, along with boosts from central banks beginning their easing cycle.】

item.title: 道达尔能源公司首席执行官表示愿意与巴西国家石油公司在海外开展合作
item.description: 道达尔能源 SE 首席执行官 Patrick Pouyanne 周一表示，随着这家法国超级巨头在拉美人口最多的国家扩张业务，道达尔能源 SE 有意与巴西国家石油公司（Petrobras）在巴西以外的项目上开展合作。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is interested in partnering with Petrobras on projects outside of Brazil as the French supermajor expands in Latin America’s most populous nation, Chief Executive Officer Patrick Pouyanne said Monday.】

item.title: 英国要求房东提高住房能源效率
item.description: 英国能源部长周一表示，英国将要求房东在本十年结束前提高全国住宅的能源效率。【原文：The UK will require landlords to improve the energy efficiency of homes across the country by the end of this decade, the energy minister said Monday.】

item.title: 俄罗斯预计未来三年石油和天然气收入将减少
item.description: 由于能源价格下跌以及俄罗斯天然气工业股份公司（Gazprom PJSC）税收制度更加宽松，俄罗斯政府认为其石油和天然气收入将在未来三年内下降。【原文：The Russian government sees its oil and gas revenue falling for the next three years due to lower energy prices and a more lenient tax regime for Gazprom PJSC.】

item.title: 法国亿万富翁对巴尼耶的富人税信号表示认同
item.description: 法国航运业亿万富翁罗多尔夫-萨德（Rodolphe Saade）表示，他的公司准备缴纳更多的税款，以帮助修复法国捉襟见肘的公共财政，这表明法国一些最富有的公民可能开始对政府政策的转变感到不满。【原文：French shipping billionaire Rodolphe Saade said his company is ready to contribute more tax to help repair France’s stretched public finances, indicating resignation may be setting in among some of the country’s wealthiest citizens to a shift in government policy.】

item.title: Telegram 首席执行官杜罗夫称应用程序将向政府提供更多数据
item.description: 消息应用 Telegram 首席执行官帕维尔-杜罗夫（Pavel Durov）表示，Telegram 将根据有效的法律要求向有关当局提供用户的 IP 地址和电话号码。【原文：Messaging app Telegram will provide users’ IP addresses and phone numbers to relevant authorities in response to valid legal requests, according to Chief Executive Officer Pavel Durov.】

item.title: 美联储讲话推动国债收益率走高，未来将有债券供应
item.description: 周一，债券收益率攀升，原因是在一系列国债拍卖之前出现了大量新的公司债券，而美联储官员的言论也打消了再次降息半个百分点的预期。【原文：Bond yields climbed Monday as a raft of new corporate debt preceded a series of Treasury auctions and comments by Federal Reserve officials discouraged expectations for another half-point interest-rate cut.】

item.title: 美国参议员寻求阻止墨西哥接管沃尔坎港

item.title: 体育直播的非法流媒体已成为主流。还能做些什么吗？

item.title: 厄瓜多尔在 60 年来最严重的干旱中提前开始停电

item.title: 基夫称汇丰希望加入人工智能基础设施融资热潮
item.description: 汇丰控股公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的一位资深投资银行家表示，该公司希望加入为人工智能所需的基础设施融资的大潮。【原文：HSBC Holdings Plc wants to join in the rush to finance the infrastructure needed to roll out artificial intelligence, according to one of the lender’s most senior investment bankers.】
